channel.title: Need help asap on hybrid pvp client!
channel.description: well i was on my server and i seen that in the quest tab it says owner kevin and his website and in bank it says on top Bank of hybridpvp how can i change that can anyone tell me????

item.title: Need help asap on hybrid pvp client!
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

pildurass:

yea i am having trouble too!!! i cant change the ip to 127.0.0.1!!! and when i do and i try to loggin and play it is hosted by somebody else… how can i change it to default? please help. same client as above

Don’t take someone else’s thread, make your own. To change the welcome message text go to client.java(in the source files) and type ctrl+f, then search some of the text you want you change. Remember to save then compile. If you have any problems with what I just said, please post it in Server Help. But not if it has something to do with the Client files.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help asap on hybrid pvp client!

item.title: Need help asap on hybrid pvp client!
item.dc:creator: @pastaway pastaway
item.description:
@pastaway wrote:

The owner part is server sided in client.java
The bank is in RSInterface.java
just fine Runescape and you should find something like

if(rsInterface.interfaceType == 4) { rsInterface.disabledMessage = stream.readString().replaceAll("RuneScape", "Your servers name"); rsInterface.enabledMessage = stream.readString(); } if(rsIn
and yea.. just replace the "your servers name" with... well take a wild guess :P

Read full topic
